## ConstantTextureCubeNode.(constructor)

Creates a new cubemap texture node

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor();
```

## Remarks

Initializes with: - One output slot for the cubemap sampler - Default 1x1 white cubemap (all faces white) - No inputs (texture resource only)
